This was a temporary glitch introduced yesterday.
Fixed TypeBinding#isCastCompiatible(...) to pass in the compilation unit scope
from the binding resolver and reenabled test CompatibilityRuleTests#test013() to
test018().
Verified for 3.1 M4 using build I200412142000.
